paragraphs.title: 202205 - 202206 • Booking.com • Amsterdam
content: Fullstack developer in the core platform team, focusing on the development of an in-house micro-frontend framework supporting the replatforming of Booking.com.
Developed a framework to share and integrate components across all products to enable multi-product offerings while ensuring a consistent customer experience.
Responsible for a high-criticality orchestrator connecting all frontend services in the Booking.com presentation layer with over 25k RPS.

paragraphs.title: 202009 - 202205 • Netlight • Stockholm
paragraphs.content: As a consultant, I’ve had the opportunity to work in a multitude of industries, such as public service, food tech and e-comm, enabling me to develop and apply my skills in a wide array of domains.

children.title: 202102 - 202205 • SVT • Fullstack Developer
children.content: As part of a new initiative within Sweden's public service company (SVT), I developed a new planning tool that is used for long term planning of content on the platform SVT Play. Being the only developer for the majority of the project, I was responsible for the complete development process.

children.title: 202011 - 202102 • Lantmännen • Data Scientist
children.content: In collaboration with domain experts, I developed prediction models for seed quality with the aim to assist machine operators at Lantmännen’s many production sites.

children.title: 202009 - 202011 • Footway • Fullstack Developer
children.content: I supported the company with feature delivery in a turbulent time when it was in the final stages of developing a new common e-commerce platform to be used by its many subsidiaries.

paragraphs.title: 202001 - 202006 • Volvo Group, Gothenburg
paragraphs.content: Supply Chain optimisation internship  where I used deep reinforcement learning to optimise the order quantities in Volvo’s aftermarket distribution.

paragraphs.title: 201908 - 201912 • Nepa, Stockholm
paragraphs.content: As an intern, I focused on improving the core of Nepa’s brand tracking engine. I solely implemented a Dynamic Factor Analysis model that halved the required amount of sourced panelist data, while maintaining the same level of accuracy.

paragraphs.title: 201809 - 201912 • We Know IT, Linköping
paragraphs.content: Web and mobile application development with a great variety of full stack projects for mobile and web. As a sole consultant, I completed projects from the idea stage to deployment, with clients ranging from public sector to industry-leading corporations.

content: Curious and versatile software engineer with 6 years of experience spanning full-stack development, consulting, and data science across diverse industries such as travel, e-commerce and public service.

My work has focused on building scalable and efficient systems, from micro-frontend frameworks to machine learning models, while keeping business goals and user needs in focus. I enjoy taking on complex problems with a pragmatic approach and collaborating closely with teams to deliver impactful, user-friendly solutions.

paragraphs.title: 201808 - 202005 • Linköping University • Sweden
content: Major in Logistics and Supply Chain Management.

paragraphs.title: Recipe Summariser (https://recipe.edenheim.se)
paragraphs.content: Recipe summariser app that provides a more pleasant experience when reading recipes online.

paragraphs.title: Queue (https://edenheim.se/queue)
paragraphs.content: Digital queue platform developed pro-bono to help small shops and businesses during the pandemic.

paragraphs.title: Social Listening (https://q.edenheim.se)
paragraphs.content: Social listening platform that integrates with Spotify and enables a group of users to vote for the next playing track.
